name: Palace of the Braincer
description:
If you are missing a lot of beats, try reloading the game and recalibrating the audio latency (audio latency in the negatives is normal).

If the audio is bugged, try using a different browser (not Safari).

In order to move and attack, the player has to press a movement key (WASD/Arrows) on the beat.

Game inspired by Crypt of the Necrodancer.

Making the Game
